name: unadvertised
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If a product or service is unadvertised, no advertisement has been been made for it: Products that are advertised on television can be twice as expensive as unadvertised alternatives. The store is offering some great unadvertised deals.
not having been made known to the general public: She ordered something from the unadvertised vegan menu. The band played an unadvertised acoustic concert at a local club.
More examplesFewer examplesMany people prefer to buy advertised products rather than cheaper unadvertised goods.Most of the jobs that come up are unadvertised.The beef was served with unadvertised roastroast potatoes.
